alert.note: Alert for Hardeman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 8:18PM CDT until July 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... Beckham County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 817 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Texola to 5 miles southeast of Wellington to 12 miles south of Memphis, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Sayre, Mangum, Hollis, Granite, Erick, Eldorado, Carter, Willow, Gould, Texola, Retrop, Delhi, Vinson, Duke, Goodlett, Madge, Brinkman, Hester, McQueen, and Lazare. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
